ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Cavern
ygData.msgSnippet: I think there s nowhere better than SolB for that level.  Go in,  turn left, and learn the loop around the well room.  I hunted with a drood in there a lot,
ygData.messageBody:
I think there's nowhere better than SolB for that
level. Go in, turn left, and learn the loop around
the well room. I hunted with a drood in there a lot,
and it was good. I solo'd my monk there from 35 - 61.

Kent
--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> My Halfling Druid will ding 42 on Thursday. I have
> him hunting Orcs in
> CC. I may stay there one more level, as it is
> profitable to hunt
> miners and sell the Velium. However, I am beginning
> to cast about for
> my next adventure.
>
> I go solo most of the time, and prefer that style of
> play. Not that I
> don't enjoy the social elements of the game. Just
> don't want to depend
> on groups. Kind of a loner, even in a game world.
>
> What would be a good next step, seeking modest to
> good leveling, and
> good to great cash? I hunt mostly blues, as I can
> take one easily, and
> two with care, and three if I must (and none of them
> are casters). Any
> suggestions as to where I go next?
>
> Barto Proudfoot0
>
>
